title: Legend of Zelda Clone
description: A faithful recreation of the first dungeon in the 1998 Legend of Zelda game on the NES using C# and Unity along with a unique mechanic introduced in the gameplay.

title: Slimey Plotformer
description: A slime platformer created in Unity combining precision platforming, physics, and puzzling.

title: Shard Bound Shadows
description: A puzzle game created with a team of game developers.
